OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive oral fludarabine day 1-5 . Treatment repeat every 28 day 6-8 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients complete remission 6 course receive study therapy . Patients follow 2 month every 4 month 2 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 120 patient accrue study within 2 year .
